@notice Validation of the quest at the end of a quest
@param tokenId id of token you want to complete quest
@notice Withdraw funds of this contract to an address wallet

@notice cancel hero in sell market
@param tokenId id key of token you want to putt in sell

@notice return all heroes in market sell
@return tokens return structure of heroes

@notice purchase a token previously put in sell
@param tokenId id of token you want buy

@param tokenId id of token you want to launch in quest

id of token you want to complete quest

params.tokenId: id of token you want level up

params.peuple: peuple with class and stat linked

params.tokenId: id of token you want buy

params.value: value of params contract you want set

params.questId: id of quest you want to start
params.tokenId: id of token you want to launch in quest

cancelQuest(uint256).notice: cancel a quest by id for one hero token

completeQuest(uint256).notice: Validation of the quest at the end of a quest

getParamsContract(string).notice: Return a parameter of contract by key index

levelUp(uint8,uint256).notice: level up hero and increment one stat

mintHero(uint8,uint8).notice: mint a hero for a value price and generate stats and parameterr

purchase(uint256).notice: purchase a token previously put in sell

startQuest(uint256,uint256).notice: start a quest by id for one hero token

withdraw().notice: Withdraw funds of this contract to an address wallet
